addBadges

public static void addBadges(java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.String badge,
                             org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTable table)
This method retrieves acquired badges checks against the new badges, and updates the table

Parameters:
email - Row Identifier
badge - New badge to add

getBadges

public static java.lang.Object[] getBadges(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTable table,
                                           java.lang.String email)
Returns the acquired and new badges

Parameters:
table - HTable to modify
email - Row Identifier
Returns:
Object[0] is an ArrayList of acquired badges, Object[1] is newly acquired badges
